museum.title: The Museum of Black Civilizations
museum.description: The Museum of Black Civilizations is one of the largest cultural spaces in Senegal and Africa. It houses invaluable heritage that deserves to be accessible to as many people as possible. This iconic place celebrates the diversity and richness of African civilizations through the ages.

project.title: The Museum 2.0 Project
project.description: Museum 2.0 is an innovative digital platform that reimagines the museum visit experience. Our goal is to democratize access to cultural content and showcase this heritage beyond the museum walls.

hackathon.title: Dakar Slush'D Hackathon
hackathon.description: This project was developed as part of the Hackathon organized by Senstartup in partnership with the Museum of Black Civilizations during Dakar Slush'D (October 9-10, 2025).
